loginView.incorrectCredentialsMessage: Invalid username or password. Please try again.
loginView.internetConnectionNeeded: Internet connection is needed to log in.
loginView.userIssuesMessage: Your user account could not be synced, please contact your site admin

alertDialog.title: Allow "EarthRanger" to access your location
alertDialog.message: Your location is used to provide real time tracking on the EarthRanger platform.

expiredTokenAlertDialog.title: Please log in again
expiredTokenAlertDialog.message: Something went wrong. Please enter your user name and password again.

permissions.title: Allow {applicationName} to access this device's location even when closed or not in use.
permissions.message: This app collects location data to enable recording your trips to work and calculate distance-travelled.

trackDialog.title: Turn Tracking Off?
trackDialog.message: Location tracking data will no longer be recorded.

patrolDialog.message: Would you like to continue tracking your device's location?

unauthorizedPatrolDialog.message: You do not have required permissions to start a patrol, please contact your site admin to be granted the required permissions to work with patrols.

mapTrackLocation.noUserId: User is not able to start tracking

statusView.unableToSync: Unable to sync, try again later.

syncAlertInfo.title: App Syncing
syncAlertInfo.message: When the device has a good connection the app will try to upload tracks, reports, and patrols. Pressing the sync button will manually start a sync.

toastReportError.message: Event type {{reportType}} could not be inserted into the local database

statusView.noInternetConnection: No internet connection detected, please try again when you have established an internet connection

settingsView.mergeEventCategoriesDescription: Event types are separated by categories

dataConnectionAlert.title: Data connection needed to log in
dataConnectionAlert.message: If you log out you will need a data connection in order to log in again.

pendingSyncAlert.title: Data that has not synced will be lost
pendingSyncAlert.message: Drafts and data that is pending sync will be lost if you log out before your data is uploaded to EarthRanger.

activeTrackingAlert.title: You cannot log out while tracking or patrolling
activeTrackingAlert.message: Please end any patrols or tracking before logging out

switchActiveUserAlert.title: You cannot switch user while tracking or patrolling.
switchActiveUserAlert.message: Please end any patrols or tracking before switching user.

reportIssue.title: How can we improve?
reportIssue.body: Please describe the issue that occurred or feel free to send us general feedback! You can also send an email to support@earthranger.com.
reportIssue.shareLogsDescription: This will help our team figure out how to fix the issue.
reportIssue.shareDbDescription: Create a copy of the EarthRanger database to assist in troubleshooting. Shared database cannot be directly imported into EarthRanger.
reportIssue.sensitiveDataDescription: By submitting this support ticket, a copy of the event data collected on this device will be shared with the EarthRanger team to process and troubleshoot the issue. You authorize the EarthRanger team to use the data with your submission to provide you support services as further described in the Privacy Policy available from the Apps Settings View.

reports.title: Events

reportsCustomAlertInfo.title: Report Syncing
reportsCustomAlertInfo.message: When the device has a good connection the app will sync submited reports and update changes to the report forms. The number of submitted reports will reset each time you switch active users.

deleteNoteAlert.message: Are you sure you want to discard this note?

closeFormAlert.message: Do you want to save the report?

requiredFieldsAlert.title: Required fields must be complete to submit this report.
requiredFieldsAlert.subtitle: Do you wish to Save it as a draft or Continue editing?

reports.unknownFieldTypeInReportSchema: Unknown field type in event schema
reports.wifiDataConnectionRequired: Wifi connection required to sync photos.

discardChangesAlert.title: Are you sure you want to discard changes?

discardReportAreaDialog.title: Are you sure you want to discard your event area?

stepOne.title: Start recording and add points as you move
stepOne.body: Add points to determine the boundaries of the event area. Move around and tap the Add Point button whenever you change directions to create the anchors of the Event Area.

stepTwo.title: Record an acceptable event area
stepTwo.body: Event Areas must be a single closed shape with 3 or more points and no intersecting segments. Any recordings that don't meet these requirements cannot be saved.

stepThree.title: Close and save your event area
stepThree.body: Your recording must be an acceptable shape to close your event area. To close it, tap the Close Area button to connect the first and last points of the Event Area. Save the Event Area to add it to the event.

discardNoteAlert.messageExistingNote: Are you sure you want to discard changes to this note?
discardNoteAlert.messageNewNote: Are you sure you want to discard this note?

startPatrolView.discardTitle: Are you sure you want to discard this patrol?

permissionsView.title: You do not have permission to create reports.
permissionsView.description: Contact your administrator to update your account permissions.

emptyEventCategory.title: You do not have access to any report types.
emptyEventCategory.description: Contact your administrator to update your account permissions or to create report types.

resetDatabaseCacheView.alertDescription: Resetting your database cache will delete all your data. You cannot undo this action.
